name: ch.py
tagline: Python library for connecting to Chatango chat servers.
body:
## ch.py
=====
Distributed under the terms of the GNU GPL. 

  An event-based library for connecting to one or more Chatango chat rooms. Has support 
for several things including: messaging, message font, name colour, deleting, banning, recent 
history, two userlist modes, flagging, avoiding flood bans, and detecting flags.

----
###### Easy Creation of Bots
  With ch.py, creation of Chatango bots is made easy. A functional bot can even be made in less than ten lines of Python code!
```
#!/usr/bin/python
import ch
class TestBot(ch.RoomManager):
  def onMessage(self, room, user, message):
    self.safePrint(user.name + ': ' + message.body)
    if message.body.startswith("!scream"):
      room.message("AAAAAAAAAAAAAA")
if __name__ == "__main__":
  TestBot.easy_start()
```
